entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 07:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Rain showers beginning this afternoon. Snow level rising to 2200 metres this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 at times overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 at times early in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
